name: Adult Education National Leadership Activities
objective: To support applied research, development, demonstration, dissemination, evaluation, and related activities that contribute to the improvement of adult education and literacy activities nationally.
sub_agency_name: Office Of Career, Technical, And Adult Education
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Funded technical assistance and evaluation activities through contracts.

authorizations.text: Adult Education and Family Literacy Act, (AEFLA), Title II of the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA), 29 U.S.C. 3332.

rules_regulations: Regulations are found in 34 CFR 460 and 34 CFR 75.730-75.734.  EDGAR
